title: China
description: Edward Rutherfurd, the internationally bestselling author of Sarum, London, New York and Paris, turns his pen to the bustling modern behemoth that is China - a country full to the brim with a deep, beautiful and sometimes violent heritage.Set from the 1800s onwards, Rutherfurd's beautiful novel explores the modern history of China with all the signature authenticity and interlacing personal stories that make him one of the most beloved authors of our time.
author: Edward Rutherfurd
